mapper.select: SELECT place_idx, place_name, category, loc1, loc2, address, log, lat, place_thumbnail_path, place_created_date, place_modified_date FROM place
SELECT place_idx, place_name, category, loc1, loc2, address, log, lat, place_thumbnail_path, place_created_date, place_modified_date FROM place WHERE category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{category}, '%')

SELECT place_idx, place_name, category, loc1, loc2, address, log, lat, place_thumbnail_path FROM place
WHERE loc1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{loc1}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO place(place_name, category, loc1, loc2, address, log, lat, place_thumbnail_path, place_created_date) VALUES (#{placeName}, #{category}, #{loc1}, #{loc2}, #{address}, #{log}, #{lat}, #{placeThumbnailPath}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE place SET placeName = #{password}, category = #{nickname}, loc1 = #{loc1}, loc2 = #{loc2}, address = #{address}, placeThumbnailPath = #{placeThumbnailPath}, member_modified_date = now() WHERE place_idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO history(member_idx, place_idx, history_created_date) VALUES ((SELECT member_idx FROM member WHERE id=#{id}), #{placeIdx}, now())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM history WHERE place_idx = #{placeIdx} and member_idx = (SELECT member_idx FROM member WHERE id=#{id})
mapper.select: SELECT distinct place_idx FROM history WHERE member_idx = (SELECT member_idx FROM member WHERE id=#{id})
SELECT count(*) as save_place FROM history WHERE place_idx = #{placeIdx} AND member_idx = (SELECT member_idx FROM member WHERE id=#{id})
